content.title: Shops
content.text: When you enter a shop, you will see an NPC (Non Player Character) behind the counter. Walk to the NPC and press M on your keyboard to enable the cursor and right-click on the NPC. The shop window will pop up displaying a list of items and their prices. Doubleclick on the item in the list you want to purchase. To use any purchased items, press the I key to open your inventory and double click on the item in the inventory list.
